properties.description: Executions of what workflow to cleanup. Keep empty for all workflows.
properties.name: workFlowName
properties.title: Workflow name

properties.description: Limit cleanup on execution state. Keep empty for all executions states.
properties.name: workFlowState
properties.title: Workflow execution state

properties.description: Only delete execution results from before. Example: 2019-05-01T00:00
properties.name: deleteBefore
properties.title: Older than (timestamp)

properties.description: Delete execution results based on age in seconds.
properties.name: deleteAge
properties.title: Older than (seconds)
